Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. We believe it will greatly enhance your operations and contribute significantly to your success. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product for $1200000. We are confident this price reflects the quality and potential impact of the product, while also providing you with substantial savings. We look forward to discussing how this investment can propel your business forward. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
